package.name: moveit_ikfast_simpler
package.description: Convenience scripts for creating IKFast plugins for simple, serial kinematic chains. Can be used to quickly create plugins for ROS Industrial manipulators.
package.author: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
